state_variables.candidates: Candidate tracking (info/status) - Use mapping(address => bool) isCandidate
state_variables.votingPeriodEnd: Time-based voting period - Use uint256 for timestamp
state_variables._REQUIREMENT_hasVoted: MUST create: mapping(address => bool) public hasVoted - SEPARATE mapping for tracking if voter voted
state_variables._REQUIREMENT_candidateVotes: MUST create: mapping(address => uint256) public candidateVotes - SEPARATE mapping for vote counts per candidate

functions.setVotingPeriod: Election function - Implement with proper data structures
functions.registerVoter: Voter registration with verification - Set voters[address] = true
functions.addCandidate: Election function - Implement with proper data structures
functions.vote: Vote casting - MUST: 1) Check auto-tabulate at START, 2) Check hasVoted[msg.sender], 3) Set hasVoted[msg.sender]=true, 4) Increment candidateVotes[candidate] - Use SEPARATE mappings
functions.declareWinner: Result calculation - MUST be internal _autoTabulate() called automatically, NOT external manual function
functions._REQUIREMENT_autoTabulate: MUST create internal _autoTabulate() function, check at START of vote() function, NOT as external manual function

security_summary:
Contract Type: Custom
Classification Confidence: 90%
Access Control: role_based
Security Features: ReentrancyGuard
Implementation: Custom from scratch
Subtype: election

Reasoning: The contract is designed for a simple election system with voter registration, identity verification, and vote tabulation, which does not fit the Governor template as it lacks full DAO governance features like proposals and quorum. It is a straightforward election system.
